Text: Let me know if there are any problems with this torrent. It's my first. Enjoy and seed!

The WTV file format is proprietary to Windows 7, and is not in common use for file sharing.
I suggest you stick to the AVI, MKV or MP4 format in the future.

Your file is also much too large. It ought to be less than 1.4 GB in size.
